testcase.name: Access a Product via category after applying multiple filters
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ebay website page..........................................passed When user navigates to Search...............................................passed And user clicks on Cell Phones & Smartphones................................passed And user clicks on All Filters..............................................passed And user add three filters - Condition, Price and Item location.............passed Then verify the filter tags are applied.....................................passed

testcase.name: Access a Product via Search
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ebay website...............................................passed When user enters Macbook in Search Bar......................................passed And user changes the category and click on Search...........................passed And user verifies that the page is loaded completely........................passed Then user first result name matches with the search string..................passed
